projects.title: Bus Ticket Management System
projects.description: Internal web-based system for managing bus schedules, routes, ticket pricing, and operational data with secure multi-role access.
projects.full_description: This system was developed to centralize bus schedules, route management, and ticket pricing for daily operations. One of the main challenges was handling complex business rules across different operational roles while maintaining data consistency. The backend was designed with clear separation of concerns, role-based access control, and optimized database queries to ensure the system remained stable and scalable as operational data grew.

projects.title: Bus Ticket Mobile App
projects.description: Mobile ticket booking application integrated with backend services for real-time seat availability and booking validation.
projects.full_description: This mobile application enables passengers to search routes, check seat availability, and book tickets. A key challenge was ensuring real-time data accuracy between the mobile app and backend services, especially for seat availability and booking validation. Careful API design and synchronization logic were implemented to minimize data conflicts and ensure reliable user experience.

projects.title: E-Proker (Employee KPI System)
projects.description: Internal application for managing employee KPIs, performance tracking, and evaluation workflows.
projects.full_description: E-Proker was built to manage employee performance through structured KPI calculations and evaluations. The main challenge was translating business performance indicators into accurate system logic while supporting different evaluation roles. The backend handles dynamic KPI formulas, evaluation periods, and access restrictions to ensure reliable and transparent performance assessments.

projects.title: MIS (Management Information System)
projects.description: Operational financial information system for recording office expenses and presenting data through analytical charts.
projects.full_description: MIS was developed to support operational financial monitoring and reporting. A significant challenge was processing large volumes of financial records while keeping reports accurate and responsive. The backend focuses on efficient data aggregation, optimized queries, and structured datasets to support chart-based analysis used by management for decision-making.

projects.title: PIS (Passenger Information System)
projects.description: Passenger information system that displays departure schedules and route information for public access.
projects.full_description: PIS was designed to provide passengers with accurate and up-to-date departure schedules. The primary challenge was ensuring schedule reliability and timely data updates from internal sources. The backend manages schedule data carefully to ensure consistency and minimize incorrect or outdated public information.

projects.title: SIMA Operation
projects.description: Operational management system for monitoring daily business activities and company operations.
projects.full_description: SIMA Operation was created to record and monitor daily operational activities across business units. One of the main challenges was designing flexible workflows that could adapt to different operational processes. The backend was structured to handle diverse operational data while maintaining clarity, consistency, and scalability.

projects.title: New Loket (Ticket Sales System)
projects.description: Ticket sales system supporting transaction processing, pricing logic, and operational sales workflows.
projects.full_description: New Loket is a ticket sales system built to handle daily sales transactions and pricing rules. The main challenge was ensuring transaction integrity while handling concurrent sales activities. The backend focuses on reliable business logic, accurate pricing calculations, and secure data handling to support operational staff.

projects.title: Personal Web Portfolio
projects.description: Personal portfolio website with dynamic content loaded from JSON for easy maintenance and scalability.
projects.full_description: This portfolio website was built to present projects and experience in a structured way. The main challenge was designing a flexible data structure that allows easy updates without modifying the frontend code. Using JSON-based content management helped keep the site maintainable and scalable.

projects.title: Self Reminder App
projects.description: Lightweight web application that displays daily Qurâ€™an verses with meanings, focusing on simplicity and accessibility.
projects.full_description: Self Reminder was built as a simple and lightweight application focused on daily reflection. The main challenge was keeping the application minimal while ensuring fast loading times and accessibility across devices. The solution was a static, clean architecture with a strong focus on user experience.

projects.title: ZanBoard Admin Template
projects.description: Modern admin dashboard template inspired by shadcn/ui design system, built using Bootstrap 5 for responsive and clean layouts.
projects.full_description: ZanBoard Admin Template is a personal project created as a reusable admin dashboard template. The main goal was to combine the clean and modern visual style of shadcn/ui with the robustness and grid system of Bootstrap 5. This project focuses on providing a structured, scalable, and developer-friendly starting point for building admin panels or internal tools.
